question: Government of India has signed an agreement with which Indian multinational corporation to improve the performance of GSTN filing portal?
explanation: Government recently signed an agreement with Infosys to improve the performance of GSTN filing portal. Infosys is the managed service provider for the Goods and Services Tax (GST) regime in India. To improve the access and performance of GSTN filing portal on a permanent basis. The technological changes which are being carried out with the Information Technology firm is expected to be operational from April 2020.
